introduction: Hi there, in this session I want to talk about one of your past travels. Where did you go?
questions: Did you travel during the summer?
Did you eat anything that you particularly enjoyed?
Tell me about your favorite memory from the trip.
Did you visit any museums, parks or anything like that?
Did anything interesting happen during the trip?
What would you recommend to other people visiting?
Tell me about the weather during your stay.
Did you travel with others or by yourself?
Would you recommend other to take a similar trip?
Was the trip suitable for families?
Did you try anything new during the trip?
Would you say it was a vacation or a work trip?
Tell me about your journey home.
